unit.utterance_translation: He is too different.
Then Fangzhang said:

unit.utterance: fómén zhī dà qǐ róngbùxià yī diān sēngěr
unit.utterance_translation: The doors of our temple are this big, how could we not have place for a crazy monk?
He meant:

unit.utterance: fómén zhème guǎngdà de yī gè dìfāng
unit.utterance_translation: The temple is so big,

unit.utterance: nándào lián yī gè fēng héshàng doū róngbùxià mā

unit.utterance: ránhòu zhégè guǎngliàng tīng le yě méiyǒu bànfǎ

And he only told himself secretly in his heart.

unit.utterance: bié ràng wǒ dài zhe nǐ
unit.utterance_translation: Do not let me catch you!

unit.utterance: dài zhe nǐ yīdìng yào bǎ nǐ gǎn chūqù

unit.utterance: ránhòu zhégè xiàbiān zhégè shìér jiù shì yóu guǎngliàng kāishǐ zhégè guǎngliàng bā guǎngliàng héshàng èn hěn tāncái
unit.utterance_translation: Then what happened afterwards, was started by Guang Liang. Guang Liang, the monk, was very greedy.

unit.utterance: tā wéishénme zuò zhégè jiāshā ne
unit.utterance_translation: Why did he make that cape?

unit.utterance: tā jiù zé guǎngliàng yǒu yī gè zuì dà de yuánwàng
unit.utterance_translation: Guang Liang had one important wish.

unit.utterance: tā de yuánwàng jiù shì nǎ tiān nágè lǎo fāngzhàng yīxià sǐ le
unit.utterance_translation: He hoped that when the old Fangzhang would die, he could become Fangzhang.

unit.utterance: wán tā jiù chéng zhùchí le
unit.utterance_translation: Then he would become head of the temple.

unit.utterance: tā jiù tiān tiānér pànzhe zhè yī tiān
unit.utterance_translation: He waited for that day every day.

unit.utterance: guò nián de fó qián dǎogào

unit.utterance: āiyā dǎogào lǎo fāngzhàng kuài sǐ ā

Lao Fangzhang should die soon.

unit.utterance: ránhòu tā jiù huāqián zuò le yī jiànér jiāshā

unit.utterance: zhégè jiāshā bù yībān shì yúnjǐn zuò de

unit.utterance: jiù shì wǔ gè rén yī tiān méirìméiyè de gān zuì duō zhī 5 lí mǐ

unit.utterance: nágè biānshàng nágè kuàiér hái shì yòng jīnxiàn tiāode

unit.utterance_translation: On it was jade, cobalt, golden hooks and white jade embroidered.
Extremely precious.

unit.utterance: měi tiān wǎnshàng tā jiù bǎ nágè tā nágè bìchú dǎ kāi

(He) looked at his cape.
My beloved cape!
My beloved cape!
Why did he say that?

unit.utterance: zhè jiù shì yǒu diǎnér xiàng xīyóujì le

Every night he looked at it.

unit.utterance: zhè jīntiān wǎnshàng yòu bǎ ménér dǎkāi le

My beloved cape!
My beloved cape!

The cape was lost.

He sat down on the ground.
My cape!
I said: Don't let (...)

unit.utterance: zhǎo bù zhuó ná nǐmén shì wèn

Guang Liang thought,

unit.utterance: zhè yě méi zhé diū le jiù diū le bā

unit.utterance: nà jiù zhè yàng le bā
unit.utterance_translation: That is just how it is.

unit.utterance: ránhòu guǎngliàng jiù qù shān ménkǒuér sánsàn xīn

unit.utterance: zhè jiāshā gāng diū xīn lǐ nánshòu

unit.utterance: ménkǒuér jiù kànzhe jìdiān yíngmiànér guòlái le

Ji Dian!
Ji Dian, you drank alcohol.
Not much, just two... two.
Ji Dian answered.

unit.utterance: zé áng fómén qīngjìng zhī dì zěn róng nǐ yǐn jiǔ ā

unit.utterance: zhēn shì zuì guò zuì guò

Smell!
No.
Guang Liang, smell!
No.
Smell!

Very delicious chop!
No,
No.
Fried chicken from cook Chai!

unit.utterance: yě bú shì yě bú shì
unit.utterance_translation: No!
The spicy guts of a duck from Wuhan!
No!

unit.utterance: zhème xián de ròu wǒ jiù huó bù liǎo le

Oh, Ji Dian!

unit.utterance: nǐ jìngrán zài sì miào lǐ chī gǒuròu

unit.utterance: kàn wǒ ná nǐ qù jiàn fāngzhàng

I can not get it down.

Oh no!

Only 52.

unit.utterance: sī bù xià lái zhà zhěng ā

unit.utterance_translation: to walk around

unit.utterance: ā dàshī guǒrán shì cíbēi wéi huái ā

unit.utterance: ránhòu sì gè rénér jiù zǒu dào le dāngpū

unit.utterance: ā zhè xiǎoèr kàn zhe le

unit.utterance: ā zhè shì miào lǐ de héshàng

unit.utterance: zhè shì bǎ mén tōu xià lái gěi dāng le

unit.utterance: guǎng liàng shuō wǒmén shì lái qǔ dāng de

that is not acceptable.

(yes), yes

unit.utterance: ránhòu zhè sī bú xià lái ā

Guang Liang:

Guang Liang said:

unit.utterance: nǐ kàn zán tiē biéde bù xíng

unit.utterance: nǐ zhè tiē zhè tiē nà tiē ménshén doū bù xiàng huà

unit.utterance: bǎ lǎo fāngzhàng de huàxiàng tiē nà
unit.utterance_translation: We will put a picture of the old Fangzhang on it.

unit.utterance: zhèyàng zánmén jiù gēsòng le lǎo fāngzhàng

After the old Fang Zhang has seen it

unit.utterance: ránhòu jiù huà le zhāng lǎo fāngzhàng

unit.utterance: guǎngliàng jiù zài zuò zài miào lǐ xiǎng

unit.utterance: tā dí zhízi shì shuí ne

They were related by blood.

unit.utterance: duì ránhòu tā jiù jiàn zhe hú
unit.utterance_translation: Yes, so he met Hu.

unit.utterance: húlái yā zhè jī tiān méi zuò shénme huài shì bā

No, no, no.

unit.utterance: jiùjiù nǐ méi zhǎo wǒ me

unit.utterance: jīntiān yòu yǒu shá shìér ràng wǒ qù zuò

unit.utterance: jiù shì shuō jiù jiù zhè jī tiān chī le kuī le

unit.utterance: bèi wǒmén de yī gè fēng héshàng bǎ wǒ de jiāshā gěi tōu le

unit.utterance: jīntiān wǎnshàng nǐ yào rúcǐ zhè bān zhè bān

unit.utterance: shū zhōng jiāodài shì zěnme gè bàn ne

unit.utterance_translation: Use fire to burn the house where Jigong lives. The building is called Dabei.

unit.utterance: ránhòu shuō húlái shuō xíng ā

unit.utterance: nà jiùjiù bǎ qián gěi wǒ bā

unit.utterance: wǒ shì nǐ qīn jiùjiù ā
unit.utterance_translation: I am your uncle by blood!

unit.utterance: gěi wǒ bàn shìér nǐ yě yào qián
unit.utterance_translation: When you help me, you still want money?

unit.utterance: qīn jiùjiù yě déi míngsuànzhàngér ā
unit.utterance_translation: My own uncle has to pay as well.

unit.utterance: yǐqián bù doū yī huí yī jié mā
unit.utterance_translation: Didn't we always do it this way?

unit.utterance: ránhòu zhè ná le 200 liǎng yínzi
unit.utterance_translation: Then he gave him 200 silver coins.

unit.utterance: dà wǎnshàng jiù gēn dào le wǎnshàng zhè húlái kàn miào lǐ méi rén
unit.utterance_translation: When the evening had come, Hulai saw that nobody was in the temple.
He jumped over the wall.

unit.utterance: ránhòu jiù ránhòu jiù kāishǐ zhè bān chái huǒ
unit.utterance_translation: He began to stack firewood.

unit.utterance: bān le yī gè duō xiǎoshí bā
unit.utterance_translation: He stacked it for more than an hour.

unit.utterance: hòulái léi dé bù xíng le
unit.utterance_translation: Then he got very tired.
How could he be so tired?
His body had gotten weak from all the alcohol and women through the years.
He was not as strong as you.

unit.utterance: méi chī huǒguōér bù yě bù chūhàn mā
unit.utterance_translation: If somebody does not eat Hotpot, he cannot sweat.

unit.utterance: ránhòu zhè shíér biānér shàng guòlái yī héshàng zuǐwāiyǎnxié
unit.utterance_translation: Then at that moment a monk came from the side.

unit.utterance: āiyā chuān zhe yī shēnér pòpòluànsuo de jiāshā
unit.utterance_translation: Oh, he was wearing a thin, broken cape.
Why did you stop stacking?
I am resting for a while.

unit.utterance: hòulái zhè wǒ jiùjiù zhè shìér bàn de bù xiàng huà ā
unit.utterance_translation: Then he thought to himself, my uncle is very rude.

unit.utterance: wǒ gěi tā shāo miào hái zhǎo gè héshàng jiāndū wǒ
unit.utterance_translation: I am burning the temple for him, and he still asks a monk to observe me.
That one said:
I will help you.
That one that had the crooked mouth and the leering eyes said it.

unit.utterance: liǎng rénér jiù yī rénér yī bào yī rénér yī bào
unit.utterance_translation: The two of them each took a stack

unit.utterance: liǎng rénér lún zhe bān bān dào le bàn yè sān diǎn duō zhōng
unit.utterance_translation: They took turns stacking. They stacked the wood half the night. When it was a little after 3,

unit.utterance: sān diǎn duō zhōng húlái shuō
unit.utterance_translation: After three o'clock, Hulai said:

unit.utterance: āiyā zhè huí gòu le bā
unit.utterance_translation: Ay, this should be enough for now.
The monk said: Yes, that should be fine.
Hulaid said:
I will set it on fire now.
The monk said: Yes, do it.

unit.utterance: nǐ zhè kuài diǎnér diǎn bā tiān doū kuài liàng le
unit.utterance_translation: Just set it on fire quickly. It is almost morning.

unit.utterance: húlái shuō wǒ zhè shāo zhégè miào lǐ de cángjīnglóu zuìguò ā
unit.utterance_translation: Hulai said: I am a sinner, that I burn down a building in this temple.
The monk said:
Ay, do not think about it.

unit.utterance: shùnshǒu qiǎngguò huǒbǎ yī bǎ jiù rēng dào le chái huǒ duīér lǐ
unit.utterance_translation: He grabbed the torch and threw it on the wood.

unit.utterance: zhī jiànzhè huǒ jiù zháo le ā
unit.utterance_translation: Immediately the fire grew.

unit.utterance: pī lǐ pā lā pī lǐ pā lā
unit.utterance_translation: Pilepalapilepalapilepala.
The wood began to bang.
Hulai said to Jigong:

unit.utterance: zésī zhè bú shì yǒu rénér shuō zán fàng biānpáo bā
unit.utterance_translation: Could people say that we are lighting fireworks?
Jigong said:

unit.utterance: méi shìér wǔ huán yǐ wài
unit.utterance_translation: Do not worry. This temple is not near the village.

unit.utterance: ránhòu yī gè xiǎoshí zuǒyòu zhěnggè lóu jiù shāo tā le
unit.utterance_translation: Then, after around one hour, the whole building had burned down.
